review: We have visited the doctor for the first and found the doctor  very helpful and well versed with his work. Doctor explained us each and every thing regarding the problem my brother was suffering with his teeth, also doctor suggested possible solutions for same and all was done in a great manner and doctor is very polite and listen to patients queries and concern and than explained the solutions accordingly.  Very knowledgeable and experienced in his field We recommend doctor Milind and sparkle dental clinic for their best in class service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was very Scared of RCT. But on a recommendation of Sparkle Dental Clinic , Dr. Sharma by a friend , went ahead. The Doctor was excellent because he made me aware af all aspects , problems and remedies of RCT and left tge decision on me. I decided foe it and Im happy to say that ot  was soooo simple and NO PAIN or any kind at the time and after RCT. Highly recommended for any Dental problem.
Later on Cap was supposed to be fixed but could not go die to Corona.  I had not done the payment for the cap but when I went this Monday, 31/5 ni issues were made and it fitted me well, Surprisingly...even after almost all a month. I'm more than satisfied and will definitely refer him to my family and friends üëçüèº
reply_text: Thanks so much ma‚Äôam for this amazing feedback!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Both Doctors (Husband & Wife) are very polite, courteous, caring and up to date in professional knowledge. Initially they properly explain about the details of the procedure to be carried out, time to be taken and its financial implications. Both of them work in tandem and compliment each other in looking after the patient, which results in speedy and meticulous completion of the procedure carried out by them. I have visited them many a times in last three years for any dental problems of self, wife and son and I am more than satisfied with the treatment and the fee they charged, which were quite reasonable.
**********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Milind is as always very friendly, take excellent care, shares the complete knowledge  of the treatment  with patient, educates the patient about the process and problem. Listen to the patient very patiently, never in a hurry.A pleasure to go to this dental office.  Reasonably priced and wonderful work and handles everything so miraculously. Earlier, I was so scared of RCT but believe  me, his clinic has given me a pain free treatment understanding my pain bearing capacities :).They truly care about their patients and oral hygiene!!
reply_text: Thanks a lot for this amazing feedback.
